title: Godly Farmer Doctor: Arrogant Husband, Can’t Afford to Offend! - Novel Updates
tags: Affair   Amnesia   Ancient China   Arranged Marriage   Beautiful Female Lead   Calm Protagonist   Caring Protagonist   Clever Protagonist   Complex Family Relationships   Cooking   Doctors   Farming   Female Protagonist   Generals   Handsome Male Lead   Imperial Harem   Love Triangles   Medical Knowledge   Modern Knowledge   Older Love Interests   Pill Concocting   Politics   Poor Protagonist   Poor to Rich   Royalty   Schemes And Conspiracies   Slow Romance   Transmigration
author: Xiao Xiao Mu Tong   小小牧童
description:
She, a famous doctor from the 23rd century, turned into a village peasant girl of a different world!

Her grandmother was cruel and vicious. Her aunt was very mean. So, to have a meal and clothing every day, she, a famous doctor had to pull up her sleeves to do farm work, treat patients, and abuse the bullies!

What? Grandmother need money for her illness? Cousin has no money to get a wife? Cousin needs to borrow money for his studies?

Roll! Roll as far as the history can go!>
